Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item holds great value for me, and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the time invested in its creation, I am offering it to you for $125. I trust this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential value it could bring to you. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
